title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1274.3 - Operators to be licensed and vehicles registered
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1274.3 - Operators to be licensed and vehicles registered

State Regulations

No motorized vehicle shall be operated in or upon a
public vehicular parking area or air terminal highway unless (a) the driver
thereof is duly authorized to operate such vehicle on State or municipal
highways and unless (b) such vehicle is registered in accordance with the
provisions of the law of the State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1274.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
